serviceTask.name: generating the VM
serviceTask.documentation:
In this task we issue the creation of the VM using the Jclouds library. This task also prepares the array of Dockercontainers that the process will have to work on. In this task we can also process the array of ports that we need to open.
For cleanness we could in the end split this task into a task for analyzing the tosca file and one to create the VM

serviceTask.name: Check VM installed
serviceTask.documentation: Here we check the cloud to have confirmation of the VM creation and getting IP information in return since we will have to open ports and add to Docker Swarm

subProcess.name: Dockerfile and image management
subProcess.documentation: In the subprocess we manage the creation of the Puppet node manifest, of the Dockerfile and the generation of the docker image

serviceTask.name: generating the Dockerfile
serviceTask.documentation: This task is a multi instance that means that the process will instantiate one of this task for all the container nodes it finds in the TOSCA file. This task will probably be transformed into a subprocess, but at the moment we needd to start mapping stuff

serviceTask.name: Add new VM to docker swarm
